name: Last Stand (fr0gb011)
description:
Jump in to an Arena FPS with Zombies and Wall Running.

Use the Red Walls to Wall Run thought out the Map to make a Quick Escape.

Walk up to Radio Towers to call in Air Drops which include Ammo and Extra Health.

Be careful for the gas station's on hit and the whole thing comes crashing down. However it might be helpful every now and then.

Controls:

W,A,S,D = Movement

Space = Jump

1 = Equip smg

2 = Equip pistol

3= Equip shotgun

Special Thanks to Prod Marrow

MARROW - itch.io

https://twitter.com/prodmarrow
